Package geometries

Class Cylinder

java.lang.Object
geometries.Geometry
geometries.RadialGeometry
geometries.Tube
geometries.Cylinder
All Implemented Interfaces:
Intersectable
public class Cylinder
extends Tube
Cilinder class represents a cylinder in 3D Cartesian coordinate system by radius, ray that start in the base, and height from the base
